charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1101_01:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] had been called 
to a cave by Roxanne.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1101_02:
Roxanne said she had something 
to discuss with [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_03:
My sincerest apologies for summoning you here
so suddenly.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_04:
The truth is, [Name:PlayerNickname ], I would
like to borrow some of your wisdom, if I may.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0401_07: I had a feeling you would say that.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0302_08: Can I be of use to you?
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0402_10:
You can be an immense help
to me, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_11:
As for why I’ve asked you here, it’s about the
Trainers’ School in Rustboro City.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_12:
I’ve been given the opportunity to instruct some
more junior Trainers.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_13:
I’m having trouble thinking of what sort of
problems I could give them that would make for
an enjoyable, educational experience.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_14: I’m thinking of doing a hands-on lesson.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_15:
I thought that escaping a cave such as this one
would be a good start, but I haven’t thought of
what should come next.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_16:
I’ve asked Nosepass for advice, 
but she just stays quiet and faces north.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0401_18: Nosepass is magnetic, so that’s typical behavior.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0402_20:
That could be, but facing north is also typical
Nosepass behavior.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_21:
Her magnetic nose is always facing north,
and she can also control magnetism.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_22:
If you lose your way, as long as Nosepass is
with you, you’ll know roughly which direction
you’re headed.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_23:
When you’re on a journey, her behavior can be
quite useful!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0301_24: You could use that in a lesson.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0401_25: If the lesson were on escaping from a cave...
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0302_27:
Maybe it could be useful not just
when you’re traveling?
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0402_28:
When we’re not traveling? Is there some other
way Nosepass’s compass could prove useful?
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0402_30: Of course! A lesson on escaping from a cave!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_31:
Nosepass’s habit of facing north and her capacity
to control magnetism...
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_32:
Both are perfect for a lesson on how to escape
from a cave!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0301_33: I think her facing north is good.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0401_34: If students use her habit of facing north...
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0401_35:
I think I could make a maze that requires them to
use Nosepass as a compass!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0302_36:
I think her controlling magnetism
is good.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0402_37:
If the students use her power 
to control magnetism...
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0402_38:
I could design a maze that makes them use
Nosepass to escape from a cave tinged
with magnetism!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_40:
With such an exciting lesson, I’m sure the
students will enjoy it!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_41: I knew consulting you was the right answer!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0302_44: I’m glad you solved your problem!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_46:
Thanks to you, I was able to find the correct
answer to my problem.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_47:
I was only thinking about what sort of lesson to
give some junior Trainers.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_48: Now I realized I’ve learned quite a bit myself!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_49:
There’s still so much for me to learn from you
and Nosepass, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_1201_01: Hmm... Why won’t my Nosepass evolve?
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_1201_02:
You gotta chill, Roxanne. Pokémon Evolution is
just like working out.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_1201_03:
The most important thing is to keep at it!
Working out gives you muscles, and as long as
you don’t give up, I know Nosepass’ll evolve!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_1201_04: *giggle* That answer is so you, Brawly.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_1201_05:
You’re right. We might not be able to see it, but
we’re definitely making progress.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_1201_06:
I’m sorry, Nosepass. I should have been more
relaxed like you. Let’s take this one step at a time.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_0101_01: All right, let’s get this party started!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_0101_02:
This battle’ll bring us another step closer
to Evolution!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_0501_01:
Whoa! You two knocked us down like a gnarly
wave! I don’t know why you were sweatin’ it.
Your bonds are wicked strong!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_0501_02:
Why, of course! Nosepass is the best partner
I could ever want!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_0501_03:
You taught me so much in that battle, Brawly.
Thank you very much!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_0501_04:
Hm? What’s wrong, Nosepass?
Wait, could it be...
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_0501_05:
It looks like keeping at it really did help you
evolve, huh? I’m so happy for you, Nosepass!
